com.raylabz.opensimplex

Class RangedValue

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.raylabz.opensimplex.RangedValue

  • public class RangedValue
extends Object
    A ranged double value - models values that are in a specific range and allows easy shifts to new ranges.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RangedValue(Range originalRange, double originalValue)
      Instantiates a new ranged value.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Range getOriginalRange()
      Retrieves the original range.
      double getValue()
      Retrieves the original value.
      double getValue(Range newRange)
      Retrieves the shifted value, given a new range.
      static double inRange(double oldValue, Range oldRange, Range newRange)
      Shifts the range of values generated by the OpenSimpleNoise generator to a given range.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        Instantiates a new ranged value.

      • getValue

        public double getValue(Range newRange)
        Retrieves the shifted value, given a new range.
        Parameters:
        newRange - The new range to shift the value to.
        Returns:
        Returns the shifted value.

      • inRange

        public static double inRange(double oldValue,
                             Range oldRange,
                             Range newRange)
        Shifts the range of values generated by the OpenSimpleNoise generator to a given range.
        Parameters:
        oldValue - The value to shift.
        oldRange - The old range to shift the value from.
        newRange - The new range to shift the value to.
        Returns:
        Returns a double number in the new range.
